abstract: The automaker’s woes, including potential problems with its Tacoma truck, continue as multiple Congressional hearings draw near.
snippet: The automaker’s woes, including potential problems with its Tacoma truck, continue as multiple Congressional hearings draw near.
lead_paragraph: Toyota said on Friday that it might expand the number of models that will receive a braking override system designed to prevent sudden acceleration, a problem that led the company to recall millions of cars.

headline.main: Toyota Says More Models Might Get Fix for Acceleration
headline.print_headline: Toyota Says More Models Might Get Fix for Acceleration
